wikipedia_page.main: Karalyn Eve Patterson,   is a British psychologist in Department of Clinical Neurosciences, University of Cambridge and MRC Cognition and Brain Sciences Unit. She is a specialist in cognitive neuropsychologyand an Emeritus Fellow of Darwin College, Cambridge.

response: *  1943   – Karalyn Patterson, English psychologist and academic
